Cherrycake\Item::getHumanized

Gets the specified item data in a way that's readable for a human.

Intended to be used by modules like UiComponentTable

    Signature

    public function getHumanized(string $key, [boolean $isHtml = true] )

    Parameters

    $key — string
    The key of the data to get
    $isHtml — boolean
    Whehter to use HTML to help make the data readable by a human

    Returns

    string
    The HTML representing
